about.title: About Me
about.description: Frontend developer with experience in creating intuitive web interfaces and integrating modern technologies. I excel in problem-solving and continuously improving user experience. I am committed to enhancing my technical skills and seeking new challenges where I can provide efficient and creative solutions in web development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and experience, if you have any questions or want to work together, feel free to contact me.
